subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Francesca Schiavone will play Yvonne Meusburger in today’s final of the Gastein Ladies tournament in Bad Gastein, Austria. Schiavone defeated Kaia Kanepi of Estonia, 6-4, 6-2, in one semifinal yesterday, while Meusburger defeated seventh-seeded Karin Knapp of Italy, 6-1, 3-6, 6-3, in the other.It will be Schiavone’s first final of the season and Meusburger’s first of her career.
